price: No tuvo quien pudiera salvarlo del designio de Dios, ni siquiera pudo defenderse a sí mismo.
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
